description:
Mo Fan is a 16 year old, high school student. In his first awakening he awakened both the lightning and fire elements.
Mo Fan was not from this world, in his world he was a genius student. Mo Fan received an old broken black pendant from a old man guarding the rear gate of his old school, after he took a nap in the mountain behind the school he woke up to a world with magic. The people he knows, students, teachers, father, sister have not changed, but the whole world is no longer focused on science and technology but into the research of magic.
name: Mo Fan
